description: Uses gray-* Tailwind classes (gray-100, gray-200, gray-400) while entire app design system uses charcoal-* custom palette
steps: 1. Open Readability History 2. Compare card backgrounds with other pages
expected: charcoal-* palette consistent with design system
actual: gray-* classes create visible color mismatch
impact: Visual inconsistency breaks cohesive design language

description: ProgressRing SVG uses hardcoded hex #E5E7EB for background ring — doesn't adapt to dark mode
steps: 1. Switch to dark mode 2. Open any project health report
expected: Ring background uses dark-mode-aware colors

impact: Visual element is nearly invisible in dark mode

description: Uses bg-gray-50 for page background instead of bg-charcoal-50 — inconsistent with app design tokens
steps: 1. Open a shared readability report 2. Compare background color with dashboard
expected: bg-charcoal-50 matching design system

description: Bar chart hover state uses bg-gray-50 dark:bg-charcoal-700/50 — mixed gray and charcoal in same element
steps: 1. Hover over category bar in dark mode
expected: Consistent charcoal-* dark mode classes

impact: Hover state looks different from other interactive elements

description: Stats cards use gap-6 (24px) while filter section below uses gap-4 (16px) — inconsistent vertical rhythm

expected: Consistent spacing rhythm (gap-6 throughout or gap-4 throughout)

actual: Mixed rounded-2xl and rounded-xl in same viewport

steps: 1. Compare icon attributes across readability components
expected: All decorative icons have aria-hidden='true'

impact: Inconsistent icon implementation pattern

description: Progress bar permanently shows 0% because completionPercentage is hardcoded to 0 — empty progress bar is visually misleading
steps: 1. View any project card 2. See empty progress bar
expected: Progress bar reflects actual completion or is hidden when unavailable

impact: Inconsistent visual cue for similar informational elements

steps: 1. Enable dark mode 2. Scroll to very bottom 3. Observe background color
expected: Dark gradient applied consistently
actual: CSS specificity issue may cause light gradient to leak through
impact: Background color flicker or inconsistency in dark mode

description: Code preview block uses bg-gray-900 text-gray-100 — hardcoded dark colors instead of design system charcoal classes
steps: 1. View badge embed code section 2. Compare with other code blocks in app
expected: bg-charcoal-900 text-charcoal-100 for consistency
actual: bg-gray-900 text-gray-100
impact: Code block colors don't match app's dark surface colors

description: Stats cards use grid-cols-4 on desktop but each card has identical visual weight — overdue (critical info) looks same as total tasks (informational)
